work-description.p1: Leading internal design team & managing multiple projects that shape the future of the platform.
work-description.p2: The iMusician brand becomes stronger as innovative products are being designed and launched within its ecosystem.
work-description.p3: Boring metadata management has given way for the most pleasant experience a customer can get using this class of applications.
work-description.p4: Under my reign, iMusician has successfully switched to SaaS model providing seamless integration of tiered subscriptions and increasing the conversion numbers from the very launch.
